settings.name: Language
settings.desc: Application interface language

settings.name: Date Format
settings.desc: How dates are displayed in the application

settings.name: Start Behavior
settings.desc: What to open when the app starts

settings.name: Launch at OS Startup
settings.desc: Automatically start the application when the system boots

settings.name: New Tab Behavior
settings.desc: What to open in a new tab

settings.name: Debug Level
settings.desc: System logging verbosity (0=None, 3=Info, 7=Everything)

settings.name: Theme
settings.desc: Application color theme

settings.name: Font Family
settings.desc: Application font family

settings.name: Font Size
settings.desc: Interface font size

settings.name: Icon Size
settings.desc: Size of file and folder icons

settings.name: Icon Style
settings.desc: Style of icons displayed

settings.name: Folder Icon Color
settings.desc: Custom color for folder icons (leave empty for default)

settings.name: File Icon Color
settings.desc: Custom color for file icons (leave empty for default)

settings.name: Row Style
settings.desc: Visual style for file/folder rows

settings.name: Show Thumbnails in List View
settings.desc: Show small previews for images, videos and documents instead of generic icons.

settings.name: Show Thumbnails in Details View
settings.desc: Show small previews for images, videos and documents instead of generic icons.

settings.name: Show Inline Row Actions
settings.desc: Show action buttons on hover

settings.name: Smart Primary Action
settings.desc: When On: left-click chooses the "best" action by context

settingsGroups.name: Layout
settingsGroups.desc: Customize the arrangement of panels, toolbars, tabs and the status bar to match your workflow

settings.name: Toolbar Position
settings.desc: Choose where the main toolbar is aligned in the top row

settings.name: Sidebar Position
settings.desc: Show the folder tree sidebar on the left or right side of the window

settings.name: Panel Layout
settings.desc: Choose whether the folder tree and preview panel appear with the tree on the left or on the right

settings.name: Show Status Bar
settings.desc: Show the bottom status bar with item counts, selection info and operation progress

settings.name: Show Tab Bar When Only One Tab
settings.desc: Always show the tab bar even if only one tab is open

settings.name: Remember Panel Sizes Per Tab
settings.desc: When on, each tab remembers its own panel splitter positions

settings.name: Show Bookmarks Bar
settings.desc: Show the bookmarks bar for quick access to favorite folders and locations

settings.name: Show Hidden Folders
settings.desc: Show folders marked as hidden (e.g. app data, config folders).

settings.name: Show Protected System Folders
settings.desc: Show critical OS folders (ProgramData, System, etc.). Recommended: Off.

settings.name: Show Dot-folders (.git, .svn, .hg…)
settings.desc: Show folders whose names start with a dot, often used for tools and version control.

settings.name: Open Folders With
settings.desc: Choose whether a single click or double click opens the folder.

settings.name: Open Folders in New Tab by Default
settings.desc: When On, opening a folder creates a new tab instead of reusing the current one.

settings.name: Show Hidden Files
settings.desc: Show files marked as hidden by the OS.

settings.name: Show File Extensions for Known Types
settings.desc: Always show file extensions (like .txt, .jpg). Recommended: On.

settings.name: Show Alternate Data Streams (NTFS)
settings.desc: On NTFS drives, some files store extra 'hidden' data streams (e.g. Zone.Identifier). When On, show them as extra entries.

settings.name: Default File Sort By
settings.desc: Default sorting method for files

settings.name: Default Sort Order
settings.desc: Default sorting direction

settings.name: Show Thumbnails in List View
settings.desc: Show small previews for images, videos and documents instead of generic icons.

settings.name: Show Thumbnails in Details View
settings.desc: Show small previews for images, videos and documents instead of generic icons.

settings.name: Hide Noisy Files
settings.desc: Automatically hide common backup, metadata and version-control items.

settings.name: Hide Backup Files
settings.desc: Do not show files like *.bak

settings.name: Hide Temporary Files
settings.desc: Do not show files like *~ and temporary editor backups.

settings.name: Hide OS Metadata Files
settings.desc: Do not show system metadata files such as Thumbs.db, .DS_Store and similar.

settings.name: Hide Version Control Folders
settings.desc: Do not show folders like .git, .svn, .hg.

settings.name: Double-click Empty Space Goes to Parent Folder
settings.desc: Double-clicking an empty area in a panel navigates one level up.

settings.name: Ask Before Deleting Files and Folders
settings.desc: Show a confirmation dialog before delete.

settings.name: Show 'Deleted' Notification
settings.desc: Show a snackbar after delete succeeds.

settings.name: Ask Before Moving (Cut–Paste) Items
settings.desc: Confirm before moving selected items to a new location.

settings.name: Show 'Moved' Notification
settings.desc: Show a snackbar after a move operation succeeds.

settings.name: Ask Before Copying (Copy–Paste) Items
settings.desc: Confirm copy operations. Turn off if you copy very often.

settings.name: Show 'Copied' Notification
settings.desc: Show a snackbar after a copy operation succeeds.

settings.name: Ask Before Renaming Items
settings.desc: Show a confirmation dialog before applying rename (useful for bulk rename).

settings.name: Rename Pattern
settings.desc: Pattern for bulk rename, e.g. File_{index} or {name}_{date}.

settings.name: Notification Duration (Seconds)
settings.desc: How long snackbars stay visible before closing automatically.

settings.name: Auto-fix Invalid File Names
settings.desc: When you type an invalid character for this OS (like \ / : * ? " < > | on Windows), FilesUp automatically replaces it (for example with _) instead of showing an error.

settings.name: Play Sound on Error
settings.desc: Play a short sound when an operation fails

settingsGroups.name: Notifications
settingsGroups.desc: Toast: Short popup that auto-hides. Snackbar: Popup with an Undo button

settings.name: Show Delete snackbar
settings.desc: Show compact snackbar after deleting small folders (≤50 items)

settings.name: Show Copy-Paste snackbar
settings.desc: Show compact snackbar after copying small folders (≤50 items)

settings.name: Show Cut-Paste snackbar
settings.desc: Show compact snackbar after cutting small folders (≤50 items)

settings.name: Snackbar duration
settings.desc: How long action notifications (snackbars) remain on screen

settings.name: Toast position
settings.desc: Where toast notifications should appear on the screen.

settings.name: Toast duration
settings.desc: How long to keep toasts visible (seconds).

settings.name: Toast color style
settings.desc: Default color style for toasts.

settings.name: Show paste rename dialog (on conflict)
settings.desc: Show a rename dialog only when a pasted item already exists

settings.name: Rename pattern
settings.desc: How to auto-rename copies, e.g. File (2)

settings.name: Show Status Bar Metrics
settings.desc: Toggle CPU, memory, and disk metrics in the status bar

settings.name: CPU / RAM Refresh (ms)
settings.desc: How often to update CPU and memory usage (milliseconds)

settings.name: Disk Check Interval (sec)
settings.desc: How often to refresh disk usage metrics (seconds)

settings.name: Disk Warning Threshold (%)
settings.desc: Warn when disk usage exceeds this percentage

settings.name: CPU Warning Threshold (%)
settings.desc: Warn when CPU usage exceeds this percentage

settings.name: RAM Warning Threshold (%)
settings.desc: Warn when RAM usage exceeds this percentage

settings.name: Send Crash/Error Report
settings.desc: What diagnostic information to send

settings.name: What we collect
settings.desc: View our data collection policy
settings.label: Click here

settings.name: Export Diagnostics Bundle
settings.desc: Download your diagnostic data
settings.label: Export

settings.name: Delete Local Diagnostics/Cache
settings.desc: Permanently remove local diagnostic data
settings.label: Delete

settings.desc: Check for new versions
settings.label: Check for Updates

settings.name: Update Mode
settings.desc: How updates are handled

settings.name: Note
settings.desc: If your version is older than one year, FilesUP may update automatically for security and compatibility.

settings.name: fileup.net
settings.desc: Visit our website
settings.label: fileup.net

settings.name: FilesUP News & Release Notes
settings.desc: View latest updates
settings.label: View Release Notes

settings.name: Privacy Notice
settings.desc: Read our privacy policy
settings.label: Privacy Notice

settings.name: License and Service Agreement
settings.desc: Terms of service
settings.label: License Agreement

settings.name: Acknowledgements
settings.desc: Third-party licenses
settings.label: View Acknowledgements
